name: Devil Mail!
description:
A pico 8 game I made at the gamejam of my uni. :-)
You play as a little devil, who collects mail as their job. They just wanna go home for the day and be done. 

There's 66 letters to collect, plenty of lives and a few little secrets for you to find!

I hope you enjoy your game.

The basis of the code is Sophie Houldens Pumpking, with a few alterations made by my prof, a friend and me. Most of the art is mine, but for example the spikes are just recolours.
